Class ImageHelper

java.lang.Object
view.ImageHelper
public class ImageHelper extends Object
Set of static functions allowing to manipulate images

  • Method Details

    • merge

      public static BufferedImage merge(String backgroundPath, String... foregroundPaths) throws IOException
      Generate a new image from a background image and a foreground image
      Parameters:
      backgroundPath - is the path of the background image
      foregroundPaths - is the list of path of the other images
      Returns:
      an image combining the foreground image over the background image
      Throws:
      IOException

    • merge

      public static BufferedImage merge(BufferedImage background, String... foregroundPaths) throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException

    • rotate

      public static BufferedImage rotate(BufferedImage original, double angle) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Rotate an original image from the center by a defined angle. The original image MUST HAVE the same width and height.
      Parameters:
      original - is the input image to rotate
      angle - is the angle of rotation in radian
      Returns:
      a new image representing the original image rotated of angle radian from its center.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • rotateClockwise

      public static BufferedImage rotateClockwise(BufferedImage original) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Rotate an original image from the center by 90 degrees in clockwise
      Parameters:
      original - is the input image to rotate
      Returns:
      a new image representing the original image rotated by 90 degrees from its center.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • rotateCounterClockwise

      public static BufferedImage rotateCounterClockwise(BufferedImage original) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Rotate an original image from the center by 90 degrees in counterclockwise
      Parameters:
      original - is the input image to rotate
      Returns:
      a new image representing the original image rotated by 90 degrees from its center.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • resizeImage

      public static BufferedImage resizeImage(BufferedImage originalImage, int targetWidth, int targetHeight)
      Resize an image to the specified width and height.
      Parameters:
      originalImage - the original image to be resized
      targetWidth - the desired width of the resized image
      targetHeight - the desired height of the resized image
      Returns:
      a new BufferedImage containing the resized image
